channel.title: About on klosterbruders tech rants
channel.description: Recent content in About on klosterbruders tech rants

item.title: New year, old me
item.description: The year 2019 has gone just as 2020 came, ringing in the decade of the (hopefully) golden ‘20s once again (see also: XKCD 2249). All the while I realized that I have shamefully neglected the blog I started on a whim, even though actually having several topic ideas to write about. I have no excuse, I’m just lazy like that. Getting from “Oh, I could write about that!” to an actual blog post that’s not just an incoherent string of thought fragments always seems like way too much of a pain in the rear department for the precious free minutes between youtube, random webpages and my warm bed.

item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: Hello, World! For some years now, I thought I should start a blog. Either because everyone and their grandma has one, or because I had exactly one more or less nonsensical idea I could’ve thrown out onto the internet. Being lazy as heck was the main deterrent of actually doing it, the other one was a mindset of having to do it “right” on first try. I’m not even sure what “right” means in the context of blogging, so those attempts didn’t last much longer.
